name: Memories (itch) (springfilledhope, Conan98, tgk)
description:
You wake up in the middle of an unfamiliar forest with no memory of how or why you're there. You keep hearing a voice in your mind, telling you what to do and where to go. You encounter a strange figure and are faced with making decisions that will decide your fate. 

Memories is a visual novel in which players decide their fate based on the choices chosen.  

A beautiful visual novel created by a team of three members within only a three-week time limit, using Renpy.
